title: Amazing Museum
review: The museum is divided into three sections.Comprising a collection of Sculptures and some excavated material of earlier civilisations,the museum features two 'Yupa Pillars'(sacrificial posts),

title: Catch up with the History of Ajmer or should i say Idan History
review: Its a small place to be but nice to see , eye to eye about the history and yes don't forget to watch the sound and light show in the evening , u can also do video recording of the same...

title: Museum
review: Archaeological museum is nice museum . Nice place for visit.This museum is good to increase knowledge.

title: Many many varieties
review: This museum has many many varieties. This is really well maintained. Good to come with children or family.

title: Near the train station
review: Located in a rectangular one-storey building with three-arched portals looking into  different sides, on the territory within Akbar Fort not far from the train station, but a little at the right angle to the road to Dargah Sharif. Interesting museum, though small. It's actually the part of the Government museum, and, as I understand it, not only of Ajmer but also of the entire Rajasthan state. Fccording to its intended profile here are exhibited ancient inscriptions, coins, artifacts from the excavations (including even from Mohenjo-Daro) and the richest section of sculpture, among which, however, are exhibits dated 6 or 7 centuries – like small figurines and black marble figure of the goddess Kali.

title: Great...
review: One of the best museum I had ever visited. Lots of things were about our ancient history are here. Light and sound show is  enjoyable.

title: Gret Museum, You will enjoy
review: This piece of ancient Archaeology is amazing! You can travel into ancient history with this place. its near the railway station. Go and enjoy the place.

title: Very knowledgeable
review: This museum shows the mix architecture of Hindu and Mugal culture which can be seen easily in Rajasthan.

title: Great Light & sound Show
review: Archaeological Museum at the Dil-e-Aaram Gardens in Ajmer is a must visit especially for the light & sound show
